_comment.plex_base_url: Your Plex server base URL, e.g., http://localhost:32400
_comment.max_concurrent_requests: maximum concurrent Plex API requests, e.g., 2
_comment.request_delay: delay in seconds between Plex API requests, e.g., 0.5
_comment.retry_count: number of retry attempts when editing metadata, e.g., 3
_comment.retry_delay: seconds to wait between retry attempts, e.g., 1
